TDAT: 	public boolean addCenterAtom(int atomID, int collID){
		boolean success = false;
		try {
			Statement stmt = con.createStatement();
			String query = "INSERT INTO CenterAtoms \n" +
							"VALUES ("+ atomID + ", " + collID + ")";
			stmt.execute(query);
			stmt.close();
			success = true;
		} catch (SQLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		return success;
	}

COM:adds a center atom to a database table and returns a boolean indicating whether the operation was successful or not
